body:
Comment 5 by **xianrenb**: 
What you are saying is not very true. The current "gofmt" program does enforce something
about multi-line formatting (related to blank lines). If there is no blank line after
"package" or "import", it would add one after each of them. If there are two or more
consecutive blank lines, it would leave only one of them. If the current "gofmt" program
does look at the above problems, I think blank lines are not minor details of coding
style.
